body.name: A Brave Outlaw's Burden: A Historical Western Adventure Novel
body.description: In the post-Civil War West, peace is an elusive luxury. Aaron, a former Confederate marauder, and his daughter seek solace on a remote Texan farm surrounded by the wild, unforgiving lands. But Aaron's attempt to escape his violent past is disrupted by mysterious disappearances and recurring damages on his fence. It slowly becomes clear that the past, ruthless and unyielding, has found its way back to haunt him.Will Aaron be ready to confront his demons when the time comes?With a constant sense of being watched, Aaron realizes that the bandits from his troubled history have tracked him down and they will not leave his family alone. At least, not until they finally get what Aaron has been desperately trying to keep buried. Just when things take a turn for the worse, a man from his old lawless days appears with a deal…Aaron will need to muster the courage to protect those he holds dear…In the vast expanse of Texas, secrets are buried deeper than the gold in hidden mines and a family's fate hangs by a thread… Aaron's journey to protect his loved ones will soon take him down a treacherous path that could cost him everything. Will he be the man he once was to claim what he fought for? Or can he rise above his dark past to secure a peaceful future?"A Brave Outlaw's Burden" is a historical adventure novel of approximately 80,000 words. No cliffhangers, only pure unadulterated action. Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars RESIDUALS OF WAR
reviews.reviewText: Story begins in setting 1879 Texas. Aaron and his daughter, Betty age 10 were on his ranch when notable incidents started to occur. As Confederate marauder is Aaron’s history during Civil War twelve years earlier that he left as a deserter to head west. Aaron became disgusted from seeing atrocities on both sides. The leader of the marauders, Hank, did not want to let him go. Why? Aaron felt his fate will be a sad ending after years of nightmares of the war and continued harrying by Hank’s gang. Aaron wanted a better life for Betty. The residuals of war needed to stop with him. Need to read story to see how spelunking happened in story. Readers’ interest is satisfied with lots of twists and turns in this story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This one starts a little slow, but when the going gets tough, the tough gets going!
reviews.reviewText: Just another excitingly series of compelling lifelike adventures that Mr. Levine is noted for. Definitely a five star extravaganza that will keep you turning pages to see what might happen next!These outstandingly descriptive storylines will definitely keep anyone turning pages to see what excitement will occur next! The Author's steady hand, and his unique writing abilities, will pacify anyone's desired expectations throughout this compelling western masterpiece! Too, the most endearing characters will grab your undivided attention immediately and their perseverance in righting wrongs tend to keep you turning pages until the final episode has been absorbed!Most definitely recommend this compelling series of unending endeavors to all readers, as you will enjoy riding along with the good guys in their efforts to keep you turning pages from beginning to end! Regardless of your reading preferences, I assure you will enjoy following the good buys in their efforts to bring justice to those responsible for their wrongful misgivings! Try it! You'll love it!!!😃

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great western showing redemption from past actiona
reviews.reviewText: I read this novel as an ARC and thoughly enjoyed it. Arron, a hard working rancher, begins to notice strange things occurring in Hua ranch. Cut fencing, missing cattle and his daughter's, Betty, dog slaughtered tip him off that the people behind these acts are from his past as a Marauder during the Civil War. He always worried they would find him to get their share of the loot. They kidnap his daughter to force him to uncover the treasure. The action to rescue Gus daughter us thrilling and shows the depth if his love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another very good book.
reviews.reviewText: The author did a very good job of handling the daughter in the book, showing her young side and the over grown older side. Her mixed up feeling she had towards her dad, after spending time with the gang, were very well handled. The story kept a mystery going over the whole length of the book. Hank’s gang was probably meaner in real life than the author shows in the book. The soft side of some of the gang was a surprise in their attitude. Some of the problems Aaron caused should have gotten him into more trouble. The personalities of all the characters were handled very well, showing how people from a different time period thought. Read and enjoy. Very good book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Brave Outlaws Burden
reviews.reviewText: A very good and wonderful story about an outlet that hid gold and other outlaws after him and his daughter and he chose to do the right thing These characters are brave and compassionate

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars well worth reading
reviews.reviewText: Once again, it’s hard to give you enough praise for an exceptional book. Enjoy each and everyone that you write. I totally recommend this book and any other book that has your name on the cover.
